meanings.sent1: The electronic device required only a few millivolts to operate efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The sensor detected a reading of 5 millivolts.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally zapped myself with a tiny shock of millivolts from the battery!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a surge of millivolts.
meanings.sent5: The gentle hum of the machine was powered by mere millivolts.

meanings.definition: A unit of electromotive force equal to one thousandth of a volt.
meanings.sent1: The circuit required precise calibration to measure millivolts accurately.
meanings.sent2: The battery output was only a few millivolts, not enough to power the device.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot ran on millivolts, making it the smallest but most efficient in the fleet.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a surge of millivolts, energizing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The dim light flickered as the millivolts fluctuated in the power supply.
